item.title: Setup Kafka Zookeeper in Docker
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: Setting up Apache Kafka and Zookeeper in docker is easy thanks to popular DockerFiles like wurstmeister/kafka-docker. Let’s go through a quick setup of Kafka and Zookeeper in docker on a single node system.
